body:
Starting a large data set (32gb allocated, 4gb resident) in the api server causes about 7.5gb allocations of `regexp.(*bitState).reset`.  The tree for that shows:

```
                                            1.56GB   100% |   github.com/openshift/origin/vendor/github.com/googleapis/gnostic/OpenAPIv2.NewParameter
         0     0% 23.08%     1.56GB  4.76%                | github.com/openshift/origin/vendor/github.com/googleapis/gnostic/OpenAPIv2.NewBodyParameter
                                            1.14GB 72.82% |   github.com/openshift/origin/vendor/github.com/googleapis/gnostic/compiler.PatternMatches
                                            0.40GB 25.67% |   github.com/openshift/origin/vendor/github.com/googleapis/gnostic/compiler.InvalidKeysInMap
                                            0.02GB  1.51% |   github.com/openshift/origin/vendor/github.com/googleapis/gnostic/OpenAPIv2.NewSchema
----------------------------------------------------------+-------------
                                            0.23GB   100% |   github.com/openshift/origin/vendor/github.com/googleapis/gnostic/OpenAPIv2.NewDocument
         0     0% 23.08%     0.23GB  0.72%                | github.com/openshift/origin/vendor/github.com/googleapis/gnostic/OpenAPIv2.NewDefinitions
                                            0.23GB   100% |   github.com/openshift/origin/vendor/github.com/googleapis/gnostic/OpenAPIv2.NewSchema
----------------------------------------------------------+-------------
                                            7.56GB   100% |   github.com/openshift/origin/vendor/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/server/openapi.toProtoBinary
         0     0% 23.08%     7.56GB 23.08%                | github.com/openshift/origin/vendor/github.com/googleapis/gnostic/OpenAPIv2.NewDocument
                                            7.32GB 96.90% |   github.com/openshift/origin/vendor/github.com/googleapis/gnostic/OpenAPIv2.NewPaths
                                            0.23GB  3.10% |   github.com/openshift/origin/vendor/github.com/googleapis/gnostic/OpenAPIv2.NewDefinitions
----------------------------------------------------------+-------------
                                            0.10GB   100% |   github.com/openshift/origin/vendor/github.com/googleapis/gnostic/OpenAPIv2.NewSchemaItem
         0     0% 23.08%     0.10GB  0.31%                | github.com/openshift/origin/vendor/github.com/googleapis/gnostic/OpenAPIv2.NewFileSchema
                                            0.06GB 56.66% |   github.com/openshift/origin/vendor/github.com/googleapis/gnostic/compiler.PatternMatches
                                            0.04GB 43.34% |   github.com/openshift/origin/vendor/github.com/googleapis/gnostic/compiler.InvalidKeysInMap
----------------------------------------------------------+-------------
                                            1.08GB   100% |   github.com/openshift/origin/vendor/github.com/googleapis/gnostic/OpenAPIv2.NewNonBodyParameter
         0     0% 23.08%     1.08GB  3.29%                | github.com/openshift/origin/vendor/github.com/googleapis/gnostic/OpenAPIv2.NewFormDataParameterSubSchema
                                            1.06GB 97.95% |   github.com/openshift/origin/vendor/github.com/googleapis/gnostic/compiler.PatternMatches
                                            0.02GB  2.05% |   github.com/openshift/origin/vendor/github.com/googleapis/gnostic/compiler.InvalidKeysInMap
----------------------------------------------------------+-------------
                                            1.12GB   100% |   github.com/openshift/origin/vendor/github.com/googleapis/gnostic/OpenAPIv2.NewNonBodyParameter
         0     0% 23.08%     1.12GB  3.41%                | github.com/openshift/origin/vendor/github.com/googleapis/gnostic/OpenAPIv2.NewHeaderParameterSubSchema
                                            1.10GB 98.42% |   github.com/openshift/origin/vendor/github.com/googleapis/gnostic/compiler.PatternMatches
                                            0.02GB  1.58% |   github.com/openshift/origin/vendor/github.com/googleapis/gnostic/compiler.InvalidKeysInMap
```

This appears to be due to openapi aggregation.

@lavalamp @mehdy If there is an easy fix in 1.7 it might be worth it.  Otherwise this should be addressed for 1.8.

labels.description: Must be staffed and worked on either currently, or very soon, ideally in time for the next release.
labels.name: priority/important-soon

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG API Machinery.
labels.name: sig/api-machinery

title: openapi in 1.7 allocates an enormous amount of space from regex
